Text: Thanks alot I have been looking for this along time I see u also have it on youtube awesome!!!! I absolutely love this movie!!!

I saw this movie when I was a child. I remember the scene where she dies distinctly.

The only scene from a movie that has ever scared the shit out of me.

This is what the readme file says:

"Torrent Created by Me 

Recorded and edited by myself.

Please do NOT reupload and claim that YOU did the work.

This is a rare film and I had to record it from the television with my camcorder."

Talk about a warped sense of reality!
